overview: A young man named Ludwig refurbishes scrap in his spare time to earn a bit more money for his already poor family. One day he finds a pocket watch that can turn back time. When he gets home, he discovers his mother rushing to get to work, something that does not seem out of place to him. Ludwigs phone rings which informs him that his mother has died. Ludwig tries to save his mother, by going back in time experiencing every stage of grief in the process.
title: Reverse
